title: Quantum Internet Goes Live: NYC to London in Zero Seconds
tldr: The first commercial Quantum Internet node is activated, linking New York and London.
Data transmission is now instantaneous via quantum entanglement, bypassing fiber optics.
Banks and governments are rushing to secure data as current encryption becomes obsolete.
metaDescription: The future of connectivity. The Quantum Internet is live, offering instant, unhackable communication between NYC and London. What this means for the world.
